board_meetings: {'msg': '', 'title': 'Board Meeting', 'header': ['Date', 'Agenda'], 'data': [['25-04-2025', 'Quarterly Results & Final Dividend Maruti Suzuki India Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 25/04/2025 ,inter alia, to consider and approve the audited financial results for the year ended on 31st March, 2025 and to recommend dividend, if any, on equity shares of the Company for the financial year 2024 - 25 Dividend recommendation and dividend payment date The Board has recommended a dividend as mentioned in the notes to the financial results enclosed as Annexure - "A". The dividend on equity shares for the year ended 31st March 2025, if declared at the ensuing Annual General Meeting, will be paid to the Members as at the close of business hours on Friday, the 1st August 2025 (Record Date). The date of payment of dividend is 3rd September 2025. (As Per BSE Announcement dated on 25.04.2025)'], ['29-01-2025', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 29/01/2025 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 31st December 2024. Change in Directorate Amalgamation of Suzuki Motor Gujarat Private Limited, a wholly owned subsidiary with Maruti Suzuki India Limited (As per BSE Announcement Dated on 29/01/2025)'], ['29-10-2024', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 29/10/2024 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 30th September 2024. Amalgamation of Suzuki Motor Gujarat Private Limited, a wholly owned subsidiary with Maruti Suzuki India Limited (As Per BSE Announcement dated on 29.10.2024)'], ['31-07-2024', 'Quarterly Results'], ['31-07-2024', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 31/07/2024 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 30th June 2024'], ['26-04-2024', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 26/04/2024 inter alia to consider and approve the audited financial results for the year ended on 31st March 2024 and to recommend dividend if any on equity shares of the Company for the financial year 2023-24. Final Dividend & Audited Results (As per BSE Bulletin dated on 03/04/2024) Audited Financial Results for the year ended on 31st March, 2024 (As Per BSE Announcement Dated on: 26/04/2024)'], ['31-01-2024', 'Quarterly Results'], ['31-01-2024', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 31/01/2024 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 31st December 2023 Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on 31st December, 2023. Appointment of Whole-time Director (As Per BSE Announcement Dated on 31.01.2024)'], ['24-11-2023', "MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 24/11/2023 inter alia to consider and approve allotment of equity shares of the Company to Suzuki Motor Corporation (SMC) on a preferential basis. MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LIMITED has informed BSE about Board Meeting to be held on 24 Nov 2023 to consider Fund raising. Allotment of 1,23,22,514 equity shares of the Company to Suzuki Motor Corporation ('SMC') on a preferential basis. (As per BSE Announcement Dated on 24/11/2023)"], ['27-10-2023', 'Un-audited financial results for the quarter ended on 30th September, 2023'], ['17-10-2023', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 17/10/2023 inter alia to consider and approve the issue of equity shares of the Company to Suzuki Motor Corporation (SMC) on a preferential basis. Outcome of the Board Meeting Outcome of the Board Meeting-Acquisition (As Per BSE Announcement Dated on 17/10/2023)'], ['27-10-2023', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 27/10/2023 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 30th September 2023.'], ['29-08-2023', 'Change in Chief Financial Officer (CFO)'], ['08-08-2023', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 08/08/2023 inter alia to consider and approve the mode of discharging consideration for the acquisition of 100% equity stake of Suzuki Motor Corporation (SMC) in Suzuki Motor Gujarat Private Limited (SMG) by way of either cash or preferential issuance of equity shares of Maruti Suzuki India Limited (MSIL) to SMC as may be decided by the Board. Maruti Suzuki Board approved issuing MSIL equity shares on preferential allotment basis to SMC for acquiring SMG subject to shareholder approval. (As Per BSE Announcement Dated on 08.08.2023)'], ['01-01-1970', 'Quarterly Results'], ['31-07-2023', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 31/07/2023 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 30th June 2023 MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LIMITED has informed BSE about Board Meeting to be held on 31 Jul 2023 to consider financial statements for the period ended June 2023. Financial results. (As Per BSE Announcement Dated on 08/07/2023) Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on 30th June, 2023 (As per BSE Announcement Dated on 31/07/2023)'], ['26-04-2023', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 26/04/2023 inter alia to consider and approve inter-alia the audited financial results for the year ended on 31st March 2023 and to recommend dividend if any on equity shares of the Company for the financial year 2022-23. Final Dividend & Audited Results (As Per BSE Bulletin Dated on 10.04.2023) Audited Financial Results for the year ended on 31st March, 2023 Dividend Recommendation and Dividend Payment Date You are kindly informed that in its meeting held today, the Board, in principle approved the creation of additional capacity of upto one million vehicles per year. Kindly take the same on record. Resignation of Mr. Shigetoshi Torii from the post of Whole-time Director of the Company pursuant to withdrawal of nomination by Suzuki Motor Corporation. (As Per BSE Announcement Dated on 26.04.2023)'], ['24-01-2023', 'Quarterly Results'], ['24-01-2023', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 24/01/2023 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 31st December 2022 Un-Audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on 31st December, 2022 (As Per BSE Announcement dated on 24.01.2023)'], ['28-10-2022', 'Quarterly Results'], ['28-10-2022', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 28/10/2022 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 30th September 2022. Un-Audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on 30th September, 2022 (As Per BSE Announcement Dated on 28.10.2022)'], ['27-07-2022', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 27/07/2022 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 30th June 2022. Standalone Limited Review for the period ended June 30, 2022 4. Consolidated Limited Review for the period ended June 30, 2022 5. Result Press Release for the period ended June 30, 2022 (As Per BSE Announcement Dated on 27.07.2022)'], ['29-04-2022', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 29/04/2022 inter alia to consider and approve inter-alia the audited financial results for the year ended on 31st March 2022 and to recommend dividend if any on equity shares of the Company for the financial year 2021-22. Audited Financial Results for the year ended on 31st March, 2022 Maruti Suzuki India Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on April 29, 2022, inter alia, has considered and recommended a final dividend aggregating INR 18,125 million i.e. Rs. 60 per share (Nominal Value INR 5.00 per share) (Previous Year INR 13,594 million i.e. Rs. 45 per share) for the financial year 2021-22. Final dividend is subject to approval of shareholders. (As Per BSE Announcement Dated on 29.04.2022)'], ['24-03-2022', 'Appointment of Managing Director and Whole-time Director'], ['25-01-2022', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 25/01/2022 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 31st December 2021. Financial Results for the Quarter ended 30th June, 2020 (AS Per BSE Announcement Dated on 29.07.2020)'], ['13-05-2020', 'MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/05/2020 ,inter alia, to consider and approve Dear Sir, Pursuant to Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby intimate that a meeting of the board of directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Wednesday, the 13th May, 2020, to consider and approve, inter-alia, the audited financial results for the year ended on 31st March, 2020 and to recommend dividend, if any, on equity shares of the Company for the financial year 2019-20. Kindly take the same on record. dividends: {'msg': '', 'title': 'Dividend', 'header': ['Record Date', 'Ex-Date', 'Dividend Percentage', 'Details'], 'data': [['03-08-2024', '02-08-2024', '2500%', "Dividend Recommendation and Dividend Payment Date The Board of Dir.ectors at their meeting considered and recommended a final dividend aggregating INR 39,300 million i.e. INR 125 per share (Nominal value INR 5.00 per share) (previous year INR 27,187 million i.e. INR 90 per share) for the financial year 2023'24 which is subject to the approval of the members at the ensuing Annual General Meeting."], ['04-08-2023', '03-08-2023', '1800%', 'Dividend Recommendation and Dividend Payment Date Maruti Suzuki India Limited has informed the Exchange that Board of Directors at its meeting held on April 26, 2023, recommended Final Dividend of Rs. 90 per equity share (As Per NSE Announcement Dated on 26.04.2023)'], ['05-08-2022', '03-08-2022', '1200%', 'Maruti Suzuki India Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on April 29, 2022, inter alia, has considered and recommended a final dividend aggregating INR 18,125 million i.e. Rs. 60 per share (Nominal Value INR 5.00 per share) (Previous Year INR 13,594 million i.e. Rs. 45 per share) for the financial year 2021-22. Final dividend is subject to approval of shareholders.'], ['07-08-2021', '05-08-2021', '900%', 'Audited Financial Results for the year ended on 31st March, 2021'], ['15-08-2020', '13-08-2020', '1200%', 'Maruti Suzuki India Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 13, 2020, inter alia, has recommended a final dividend aggregating INR 18,125 million i.e. INR 60 per share (Nominal value INR 5.00 per share) (Previous Year INR 24,166 million i.e. INR 80 per share) for the financial year 2019-20. Final dividend is subject to approval of shareholders. The dividend payment date is August 31, 2020 subject to the approval of the shareholders in the ensuing annual general meeting.'], ['17-08-2019', '14-08-2019', '1600%', 'Maruti Suzuki India Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on April 25, 2019, inter alia, has considered and recommended a final dividend aggregating INR 24,166 million i.e. INR 80 per share (Nominal value INR 5.00 per shore) (Previous Year INR 24,166 million i.e. INR 80 per share) for the financial year 2018-19.'], ['17-08-2019', '14-08-2019', '1600%', 'Rs.80.0000 per share(1600%)Final Dividend'], ['17-08-2018', '14-08-2018', '1600%', 'Rs.80.0000 per share(1600%)Final Dividend'], ['29-08-2017', '24-08-2017', '1500%', 'Rs.75.0000 per share(1500%)Dividend'], ['02-09-2016', '31-08-2016', '700%', 'Rs.35.0000 per share(700%)Final Dividend'], ['28-08-2015', '26-08-2015', '500%', 'Rs.25.0000 per share(500%)Final Dividend'], ['01-09-2014', '27-08-2014', '240%', 'Rs.12.0000 per share(240%)Dividend'], ['16-08-2013', '13-08-2013', '160%', 'Rs.8.0000 per share(160%)Dividend & A.G.M.'], ['17-08-2012', '14-08-2012', '150%', '04/09/2012 Equity Rs.7.50 per share(150%)Final Dividend & A.G.M.'], ['26-08-2011', '24-08-2011', '150%', 'Rs.7.50 per share(150%)Dividend'], ['26-08-2010', '24-08-2010', '120%', 'Rs.6.00 per share(120%)Dividend'], ['21-08-2009', '18-08-2009', '70%', '70% Dividend & A.G.M.'], ['20-08-2008', '14-08-2008', '100%', '100% Dividend & A.G.M.'], ['24-08-2007', '22-08-2007', '90%', '90% Dividend & A.G.M.'], ['25-08-2006', '23-08-2006', '70%', '70% Dividend']]}
